attributes.action: Say no to no deal Brexit
attributes.additional_details:
BREXIT. URGENT. SAY NO TO NO DEAL
It is too late for this to be debated, but this petition is to draw attention to the depth of feeling in the UK.
There are too many urgent issues in the World that need all nations to pull together.
This is not a time to pull apart. If we cannot agree terms for leaving the Union, with Europe, our closest friends and neighbours, how can we expect to agree solutions to the World’s greater problems that are leading to extinction of life on our planet, as we know it?
A Brexit with no deal is bad for Britain, bad for Europe and gives the wrong signal to the rest of the World. It is based upon misguided self- interest. It will make life in this country more difficult and more stressful.
This is not leadership. This is failure.
attributes.background: I want the Government to make sure that the Brexit negotiations do not end without a deal

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition calling for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/329500
